Originally a one bedroom, now configured as a large studio (wall can be put back up). Featuring sweeping open, southern views down to the Con Edison clock tower in Union Square, streams of light, high ceilings and character in a classic landmarked 9 story elevator building. Also, attractive north and west views over gardens. Original hardwood floors are in excellent condition. Apartment comes with key to New York's preeminent and private Gramercy Park. Gramercy Park is at the center of one of New York's most vibrant neighborhoods. Great restaurants and a short… :: 253 :: distance to Union Square. Wonderful and spacious apartment has all sorts of treasures throughout. Beautiful hardwood flooring, high ceilings, windows in every room, eat-in kitchen with d/w and a large living room . From the living room you can enjoy all 4 seasons while gazing out at the historic J. Hood Wright Park. The park is lush with greenery, play areas and even has a dog run. This unit has north and south exposures which allows for wonderful cross breezes year round. Just steps to the A, C & 1 trains, M4 and M98 express buses, shopping, restaurants, Columbia Presbyterian… :: 259 :: Hospital and Starbucks too. :: 250 :: 	Write a note :: 251 :: 	Report an error :: 252 :: 	Fabulous Triple Mint Sponsor 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom duplex complete with wood-bu :: 253 :: <BR/> :: 254 :: rning fireplace and terrace. New renovation, designed to capture its 1880's origins, includes custom gourmet open kitchen with top of line stainless appliances and Waterworks fixtures. Bathrooms are stunning and redone with all Waterworks materials. Elegant brownstone details have been restored including exposed brick walls, carved wood mantelpieces and beautiful hardwood floors. The scale is magnificent; it is a 20' wide house with 10' high ceilings and well-proportioned rooms. The spacious and elegant layout includes a wonderful open Living Room, Open Kitchen,… :: 255 :: three bedrooms, two full bathrooms, refinished outdoor terrace, two original fireplaces (one wood-burning) and washer / dryer. The entire home was beautifully renovated with all new solid red oak doors, new wood crown and baseboard moldings and new refurbished floors. The stunning renovation preserves the feel of the old-world by enhancing and working with the beautiful details of the era. Modern upgrades in addition to above include new washer/ dryer, radiant heated bathroom floors (in master bath) and through-the-wall air conditioning. The natural light is superb; oversized windows north and south overlook gardens and a tree-lined block and provide the whole home with brilliant natural light. All lighting fixtures are from high end sources including ABC Home, Restoration Hardware, Waterworks & Rejuvenation Lighting. has a separate entry foyer, large living room and a renovated kitchen and bathroom. The windowed kitchen has been thoughtfully designed with no detail overlooked and features beautiful granite counter tops, cherry wood cabinets, dishwasher, washer/dryer, Jerusalem stone floors and a granite top breakfast nook. This lovely apartment also features a renovated windowed bathroom, a large bedroom with open city views and lots of closets. Prewar details throughout include a gracious entry foyer with arched doorway, beamed ceilings… :: 254 :: and stunning hardwood floors. An excellent full service Co-op building with 24-hour elevator attendant, the building also offers bike, laundry and storage rooms. Mail is delivered right to your door and pets are welcome. Located in close proximity to the newly constructed Columbus Square retail shopping complex, Whole Foods, and the best the Upper West Side has to offer. Two well-proportioned bedrooms are comfortably separated from the living spaces, and all rooms feature significant… :: 245 :: closet and storage space, as well as grand pre-war detail and soaring 10'9 ceilings. This much-desired East Side neighborhood is an easy walk to Central Park, Madison Avenue shopping, transit, museums, and Midtown.
